set.description: The ID of the power to check whether the target entity is in.
set.markdownDescription: The ID of the power to check whether the target entity is in.

type.description:
[Bi-entity Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/bientity_condition_types/in_set)

Checks whether the target entity is within a power that uses the [Entity Set (Power Type)](../power_types/entity_set.md) of the actor entity.

Type ID: `origins:in_set`
